tool_description: +400 Basketball Leagues & Cups with Livescore, Odds, Bookmakers, Statistics, Standings, Historical Data, Countries, Seasons. Documentation : https://api-sports.io/documentation/basketball/v1. Widgets : https://www.api-football.com/widgets
name: API-BASKETBALL
title: API-BASKETBALL

api_list.name: countries
api_list.description: Get all available countries | The {country} and {code} keys can be used in other endpoints as filters

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Fails if field contains anything other than alpha-numeric characters, numbers or space

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: Fails if field contains anything other than an integer

optional_parameters.name: code
optional_parameters.description: 2 characters | Fails if field has anything other than alphabetic characters | Ex : FR, GB, IT...

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: 3 characters minimum | Fails if field has anything other than alphabetic characters

api_list.name: seasons
api_list.description: Get all available seasons | All {season} can be used in other endpoints as filters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-basketball.p.rapidapi.com/seasons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-basketball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: leagues
api_list.description: Get all available leagues | The league {id} are unique in the API and leagues keep it across all seasons

optional_parameters.name: season
optional_parameters.description: Fails if field contains anything other than a valid season [YYYY] or [YYYY-YYYY]

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Fails if field contains anything other than alpha-numeric characters, numbers or space

optional_parameters.description: 2 characters | Fails if field has anything other than alphabetic characters | Ex : FR, GB, IT...

optional_parameters.name: search

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Fails if field contains anything other than an integer

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-basketball.p.rapidapi.com/timezone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-basketball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
